mapper.select: SELECT T.*, CASE WHEN T.STATUS = 'SUCCESS' and bank_Status ='C' THEN 'SUCCESS' WHEN T.STATUS = 'SUCCESS' and bank_Status ='D' THEN 'FAILURE' WHEN T.STATUS = 'FAIL' THEN 'FAILURE' WHEN T.STATUS = 'CONFIRM_FAILURE' THEN 'CONFIRM_FAILURE' WHEN T.STATUS = 'CONFIRM_SUCCESS' THEN 'CONFIRM_SUCCESS' WHEN T.STATUS = 'EXCEPTION' THEN 'EXCEPTION' ELSE 'DEALING' END RESULT_STATUS, CASE T.BUSINESS_TYPE WHEN 'PERSONAL_WITHDRAW' THEN 'KINGDEE_WITHDRAW' WHEN 'MERCHANT_SETTLE' THEN 'KINGDEE_SETTLE' ELSE T.BUSINESS_TYPE END transFlowOperate FROM BMS_CLEAR_KINGDEE_PAY T WHERE T.OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT T.* FROM BMS_CLEAR_KINGDEE_PAY T WHERE T.CLEAR_ID = #{clearId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE TD_WITHDRAW_BILL t SET T.WITHDRAW_STATE = '23', T.MODIFY_TIME = NOW() WHERE T.WITHDRAW_SN = ( SELECT C.WITHDRAW_SN FROM BMS_CLEAR_KINGDEE_PAY P, TD_WITHDRAW_CHILD_BILL C WHERE P.OPER_ID =C.WITHDRAW_REQSERIALID AND P.CLEAR_ID = #{clearId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

UPDATE BMS_MERCHANT_SETTLE T SET T.STATUS = 'AUDIT_PASS' WHERE T.ID = ( SELECT C.SETTLE_ID FROM BMS_CLEAR_KINGDEE_PAY P, BMS_MERCHANT_CHILD_SETTLE C WHERE P.OPER_ID =C.ORDER_ID AND P.CLEAR_ID = #{clearId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

UPDATE BMS_CLEAR_KINGDEE_PAY T
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.CLEAR_ID = #{clearId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
